document_data.mainbody:
ady Kerri Assumbar was the matriarch of the Assumbar noble family in Waterdeep during the late 14 century DR.
She was a devout follower of Siamorphe and active within the Chapel and Chalice of the Divine Right that was housed within the Assumbar Villa.
Lady Kerris mother, Belkerri Gulderhorn, married her off to Lord Laeros Assumbar shortly after they arrived in Waterdeep from their flight from Tethyr. Vrom Gulderhorn was her brother.
